command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/7/7/dataset_c7764a31-a1ef-4668-acd3-0231e2fb0987.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&            bcftools view     --samples 'NA00002'     --min-ac 1 --max-ac 1 --types "snps"                     --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/a/6/8/dataset_a6821494-eaf8-4e62-a989-b2508fa9d558.dat'
